item.strangematter.research_tablet.toolt: A mysterious device for organizing and viewing research data. Right-click to open the research interface.
research.strangematter.foundation.name: Foundation Research
research.strangematter.foundation.descri: Basic understanding of anomaly physics and containment principles.

research.strangematter.gravity_control.d: Understanding and controlling gravitational forces within anomaly fields.
research.strangematter.temporal_stabilit: Methods for stabilizing temporal distortions and controlling time flow.
research.strangematter.spatial_anchoring: Techniques for anchoring spatial distortions and creating stable portals.
research.strangematter.shadow_manipulati: Understanding and harnessing shadow-based anomalies and perception effects.

research.strangematter.cognitive_interfa: Advanced mental interfaces for interacting with anomaly phenomena.
